import { useRef } from 'react' import { use } from 'react-router-dom' import styles from './NewQuote.module.css' const NewQuote = () => { const author = useRef() const quoteText = useRef() const addQuoteHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log(author.current.value) console.log(quoteText.current.value) } return(
) } export default NewQuote
